about_the_game:
Have you ever wished for the ability to control water? In Water Me you'll do just that! Water Me is an adventure 3D puzzle platformer in which you'll play as a water droplet that can change its state of matter.

Wislist Water Me now


Water Me is tailored to balance platforming and puzzle solving, where one depends on the other. The puzzles are designed with the intention of challenging you, but also teaching you new mechanics that you'll later need for the platforming part of the game.

Cute Post-Apocalyptic Game


The game is set in a seemingly post-apocalyptic world without water, in which you'll play as the last water droplet. Your world is inhabited by the civilization of Dusties, living dust-ball creatures who created you to help save the Mother Plant and their dying world. Roam your surroundings high and low, discover what happened to the ones who came before, untangle the mysteries of the Dusty civilization, and save their world, one plant at a time!

Features:


  • Four states of mater
  • Challenging puzzles
  • Exciting platforming
  • Mechanics bound to a specific state of mater
  • Additional mechanic from combining ones previously learned
  • Enhanced movement/mechanics by changing your state of mater
  • Mini Games/ Mini Levels
  • Sandbox
  • Collectables
  • Charming environment
  • Adorable creatures
  • Fiery enemies
  • You can pet bugs!
  • Rich story

Demo coming soon

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows
  • Processor: Celeron G530 2.4Ghz or similar
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GT 650M or similar
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Minimum requirements for playing at 720p@30fps

short_description: Indie adventure 3D puzzle platformer where you play as a water droplet that can change its state of matter. You will use that power to solve puzzles and navigate the open world levels. Water a dying plant. How hard can that be?
supported_languages:
English*, German*, Spanish - Spain*, Serbian*
*languages with full audio support
